title: Their health is our wealth
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Eric Thompson and Malcolm Otton
brief_description: The film shows the various stages of training for degrees in Veterinary Science at the University of Sydney and the University of Brisbane, including academic training and practical training at the University farm. The film also shows aspects of the various fields of work open to graduates (for example private practice with farm animals or pets, research work for government agencies or commercial firms).
